reviewText: Exellent DVD mainly features Kelle Marie on cover also Zdenka Podkapova in this issue her striptease is the hottest in this DVD.

Hot Body Video Magazine - Natural Nudies is fifty-five minutes and was released on DVD on June 5, 2007. The video features eight ladies with no surgical enhancements; at least that what the DVD claims. Included in the DVD are two Penthouse Pets: Kellemarie-Penthouse Pet of the Month for May 2001 and Zdenka Podkapov-Penthouse Pet of the Month for April 1998 and Penthouse Pet of the Year for 2001. Most of the ladies are sexy looking and only two would I count as cute and safe to take home to mother.  Below are my comments of the ladies as they appear in the order of the video.

Michelle Louise is topless and then fully nude with the exception of high heels. Most of the time she just fondle her breasts; she is cute to look at though.
Celeste Crawford starts off wearing a red dress and slowly in a striptease fashion she takes the dress off and the same goes for the panties.
Zdenka Podkapov (last name is never giving) quickly becomes topless and about a minute later, she is 100% clothes free. Zdenka also splashes around in the Jacuzzi.
Linda is wearing a blouse and a black mini skirt and slowly the top comes off. The black skirt is next and finally the panties are the last to go.
Katie Jordon is dress in a black teddy and becomes nude in the outdoors.
Tabitha Stern is wearing a matching blue tow piece outfit. Less then thirty seconds into the segment, the only thing she is wearing is a G-string. About another thirty seconds she is seconds.
Sydney Moon is wearing a matching blue top and short shorts and she is mainly for a long time and then completely nude on a sofa.
Kellemarie is wearing a pink top and skirt. First the top and then a few seconds later the skirt and we see Kellemarie in her birthday suit. In dance #2, she is wearing her purple interview dress. The only difference between dance #1 and #2 is we have to wait till the panties come off in dance #2 before she bares it all.

Overall it is a great video to watch and the only beef that I have with the DVD is the time limit. On the back of the cover says the running time is one hundred and one minutes and is actually on fifty-five minutes. Hot Body Video Magazine - Natural Nudies gets an AAAAA+++++.
